casebody.data:
STATE of Connecticut
v.
Alexander BARBER Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided February 1, 2017

Daniel J. Foster, assigned counsel, in support of the petition.

Timothy F. Costello, assistant state's attorney, in opposition.

The defendant's petition for certification for appeal from the Appellate Court, 169 Conn. App. 906, 155 A.3d 328 (2016), is denied.
